actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to transfer management of the Tishomingo National Wildlife Refuge in Oklahoma to the State of Oklahoma, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Transfers the management of Tishomingo National Wildlife Refuge in Oklahoma to the Director of the Oklahoma Department of Wildlife Conservation. Requires the transferred lands and waters to: (1) be managed as they were managed by the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service; and (2) continue to be a national wildlife refuge. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to transfer management of the Tishomingo National Wildlife Refuge in Oklahoma to the State of Oklahoma, and for other purposes.
